sentences.english: I only brought my passport and the Foreign Employment License.
sentences.chinese: 我只带了护照和外国人就业证。

sentences.english: It took only a short walk on a Beijing street to find other foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 我在北京街头仅走了一小段路来寻找其他的外国人。

sentences.english: Overseas chinese are bring into foreigners since 2000.
sentences.chinese: 从2000年起，华侨并入外国人统计。

sentences.english: Foreign reporters weren't permitted inside a fence around the courthouse in western Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 外国记者被拦在位于沪西的法院栅栏外。

sentences.english: In China, the Chinese enterprises are faced with the foreign brands catering enterprises to squeeze.
sentences.chinese: 在国内，中餐企业面临着外国品牌餐饮企业的挤压。

sentences.english: China has a big stake in Myanmar.It is the country’s leading foreign investor. Myitsone is one of manyhydropower, mining and infrastructure projects there.
sentences.chinese: 中国在缅甸拥有重大利益，是该国重要的外国投资者。

sentences.english: Temporary foreigners' residence permits shall be issued to those residing in China for less than a year.
sentences.chinese: 外国人临时居留证，发给在中国居留不满一年的人员。

sentences.english: Liu often encourages foreigners to visit Shenzhen at sports meetings.
sentences.chinese: 比赛时，刘虹都会邀请外国运动员到深圳看一看。

sentences.english: It is not just foreigners who worry.
sentences.chinese: 担心这个问题的不仅是外国人。

sentences.english: “Foreign critics would look at today’s data and argue for stronger yuan gains,” said Ben Simpfendorfer, a Hong Kong-based economist at Royal Bank of Scotland Plc.
sentences.chinese: 外国评论家看到今天的数据，又会说让人民币升值。

sentences.english: He didn't get any money for this. He didn't go to a foreign government.
sentences.chinese: 他没有拿情报来卖钱，没有勾结外国政府。

sentences.english: Since its founding, has received more than 400 foreign students trained people.
sentences.chinese: 建校以来，先后接受培养了外国留学生400余人。

sentences.english: Japanese firms have tried to be as penny-pinching on pay in their foreign operations as they have at home.
sentences.chinese: 日本企业在外国试图像它们在国内那样小气。

sentences.english: Hou Yiling, English literature professor at Beijing Foreign Studies University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 北京外国语大学英语系教授侯毅凌对此表示赞同。

sentences.english: What starts as criticism of the foreign can quickly swing to domestic targets.
sentences.chinese: 对于外国的批判可以很快摇身一变指向内部的目标。

sentences.english: I graduated from Shanghai International Studies University, my major is English, and i passed TEM-8 with a high mark.
sentences.chinese: 英语专业八级，上海外国语大学研究生毕业。

definition: United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
Internet slang for 外國人|外国人[wai4 guo2 ren2]
